name: oriental
content:

Add to word list
relating to the countries of East and Southeast Asia: oriental cuisine/fruits/plants The concrete floor was covered with oriental rugs. Compare
occidental formalSee
the Orient
More examplesFewer examplesIn oriental medicine the body is made up of seven major chakra or energy points.He became fascinated with all things oriental. She's an acupuncturist and oriental medicine practitioner.
